sen.j: 具志頭制縛致死事件（ぐしちゃんせいばくちしじけん）とは、1907年（明治40年）5月18日に沖縄県島尻郡具志頭村間切（現八重瀬町）で発生した私刑殺人事件。
sen.e: Gushichan restraint murder case was a lynch murder case occurred in Gushichan magiri (old administrative district), Shimajiri gun, Okinawa Prefecture (currently Yaese town) on May 18, 1907.

sen.j: 1907年5月18日、具志頭間切の某村落で盗難事件が発生した。
sen.e: On May 18 1907, a case of theft occurred in a village of Gushichan Magiri.

sen.j: 犯人を見つけるべく、村の掟である内法 (沖縄)に基づく取調が開始された。
sen.e: In order to find the perpetrator, interrogation had started based on Naiho (a method of measuring internal dimension), village law.
To find the perpetrator, the villagers began interrogations according to the local village laws.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味をより分かりやすくために訳文を変えました。
sen.e: To find the perpetrator, the villagers began interrogations according to the local village laws.

sen.j: その方法とは、一本の紐を地面の上に置き、1人ずつその紐の上を歩いて前進し、酒を飲んで元に戻るというもので、その間に石を投げられた者が犯人とする非科学的・迷信的手法であった。
sen.e: That investigation was nonscientific superstitious method; placed a string on the ground and took step forward one by one, return after the drink and the one who was stoned during that was a criminal.

They used a method of interrogation that was based in superstition and that was entirely unscientific; they would place a string on the ground and one by one people would walk on the string, drink liquor, walk back across the string, and whoever was stoned during the process was declared guilty.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味をより分かりやすくために訳文を変えました。

sen.j: そんな杜撰な方法で、ある男性（50歳）が犯人とされた。
sen.e: A man was accused as a criminal by this sloppy interrogation.
A man was accused as a criminal through this haphazard method of interrogation.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味をより分かりやすくために訳文を変えました。

sen.j: 男性は木に縛り付けられ村人からリンチを受けたが、当然の事ながら盗まれた金銭の在りどころは分かるはずもない。
sen.e: He was tied up to the tree got lynched by village people but, of course, he didn't know where the stolen money was.
He was tied to a tree, and lynched by the crowd, but didn't know where the stolen money was.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味をより分かりやすくために訳文を変えました。
sen.e: He was tied to a tree, and lynched by the crowd, but didn't know where the stolen money was.

sen.j: 執拗な拷問の結果、ついに男性は惨殺された。
sen.e: He was brutally murdered by persisting torture.
He died under brutal torture.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味をより分かりやすくために訳文を変えました。
sen.e: He died under brutal torture.

sen.j: 男性の惨殺後、村人たちは沖縄県警察部に「内法に基づく取り調べの結果、犯人が絶命した」と平然と届け出た。
sen.e: After his murder, the village people reported this in cold blood to the police department of Okinawa Prefecture as 'After the investigation based on Naiho, the suspect died.'
After his murder the villagers indifferently reported to the Okinawa Prefecture Police that "after investigations based on Naiho (internal methods) the guilty party died".

sen.j: 警察はもちろん、このようなリンチ殺人を黙認するはずもなく、逆に惨殺に加担した村人を殺人の容疑で逮捕した。
sen.e: Needless to say, police didn't accept silently, on the contrary, arrested village people who took part in the murder as a murder suspect.
Needless to say, the police didn't condone the killing, and arrested all the villagers who took part in it on charges of murder.

sen.j: 裁判の結果、首謀者に懲役12年、他の3人に懲役9年の判決が下った。
sen.e: After the trial, the mastermind was sentenced to 12 years in prison and the other three suspects were sentenced to 9 years in prison.
